The Ophthalmic Adaptive Optics Handbook

This handbook is a comprehensive resource for users and developers of ophthalmic adaptive optics technology at all levels of expertise.

The Handbook About Revisions Authors

  • Optical design of ophthalmoscopes
  • Part 2
  • Sample optical designs
  • Sample code/algorithms
  • Sample mechanical designs

Emphasis

*This text will be italic*
_This will also be italic_

**This text will be bold**
__This will also be bold__

_You **can** combine them_

This text will be bold This will also be bold

Lists

Unordered

* Item 2

Ordered

1. Item 1
1. Item 2
1. Item 3

   1. Item 3b
  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3
    1. Item 3a
    2. Item 3b

Formulas

# Wrap the formula in a div first
<div>
    \begin{align*}
    f(x) &= x^2\\
    g(x) &= \frac{1}{x}\\
    F(x) &= \int^a_b \frac{1}{3}x^3
    \end{align*}
</div>
\begin{align*} f(x) &= x^2\\ g(x) &= \frac{1}{x}\\ F(x) &= \int^a_b \frac{1}{3}x^3 \end{align*}
